entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon then changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Periods of snow over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
